summary: This bill, the Countering Threats and Attacks on Our Judges Act, amends the State Justice Institute Act of 1984. It authorizes the State Justice Institute to provide awards to eligible national nonprofit organizations to establish State judicial threat intelligence and resource centers. These centers will provide training, monitor threats, coordinate with law enforcement, develop reporting practices, create a national database for threat information, and research best practices for judicial security. The State Justice Institute must submit annual reports on threats to judiciary members and court staff.
